nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures 23 is the twenty-third issue of the canon comic book series Star Wars Adventures. It is comprised of the stores "A Race for Answers," by Ian Flynn, and "Tales from Wild Space: Majordomo, Major Problems," by Arie Kaplan. The issue was published on July 3, 2019 by IDW Publishing.
Join Lando Calrissian and Chewbacca aboard the Millennium Falcon for another rollicking mission on behalf of the Rebel Alliance!
